message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do a bit better than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think the product is worth more than $100. How about we say $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant. How about we try $105? That's the best I can do for now.

I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I get a good price for the product. How about we say $112? I think that's a fair compromise.
